entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:52 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: S 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 then light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
